stimulusHtml: Set up, but do not integrate, an integral expression in terms of a single variable for the volume of the solid generated by revolving the region R, given in part (b), about the x-axis.

features.html: Let f be the function given by f(x)=eâˆ’x , and let g be the function given by g(x)=kx , where k is the nonzero constant such that the graph of f is tangent to the graph of g.
